content.rendered:
THE POWER SUIT

This season the colors are muted and the power suit is best worn with an oversized fit with slick hair in a bun and chunky gold earring or necklaces.

The power suit never goes out of style…..it just gets a sharper update. The Fall and Winter season is the perfect time to suit up especially with beautiful muted Fall colors like dusty browns and moody greens. And don’t forget to show off your beautiful D’Lashes lashes with your new slick pulled back hair. Stunning lashes are always in style!

Both looks are from FWRD.COM. Top bag is Jacquemus. Lashes are by yours truly D’Lashes.com. Gold earrings are Saint Laurent. Brown shoes are Gucci. Bottom brown bag is Saint Laurent.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!

Xo Xo, Dionne
